> SELECT alarm_name alarmName, alarm_meaning alarmMeaning, alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, alarm_type alarmType, alarm_scop alarmScope, recommend FROM unicom_alarm_library_lte WHERE alarm_name = #{alarmName}
